name: Galeries Lafayette UAE
description:
Where are you guaranteed to find a present in a total area of 215,000 square feet? Galeries Lafayette – Dubai: the largest department store in Dubai, a unique shopping destination with French heritage. 

Open since 2009, Galeries Lafayette is a full-range, upscale department store located in the largest shopping mall in the Middle East, The Dubai Mall keeping the French fashion spirit truly alive in the shopping capital of the Middle East. 

Galeries Lafayette differentiates itself from any other department store by offering a 360 degree shopping experience which includes womenswear, abayas, eveningwear, menswear, jewellery, kidswear, lingerie, luxury accessories and shoes, beauty, homeware, and lastly, Lafayette Gourmet: an international food hall offering a whole range of flavors from all over the world, thanks to 11 different kitchens.

The services offered by Galeries Lafayette include a unique loyalty card program with extensive benefits, personal shopping, a hairdressing salon by Jacques le Coupe, complimentary tailoring, catering and home delivery services by Lafayette Gourmet, and much more.

A wide selection of the most fashionable and top designer labels, such as Fendi, Michael Kors, Tod’s, Marc Jacobs, Etoile, and Mont Blanc as well as Galeries Lafayette’s private label, blended with casualwear brands such as Diesel, Franklin and Marshall and Pinko make Galeries Lafayette a unique destination for shopping, for expat, local, and tourist customers alike. Moreover, numerous exclusive brands such as Karl Lagerfeld, Poca Poca, Queen of Spades, Mauboussin, Lorenzo Villoresi, and many others, makes a visit to Galeries Lafayette an unforgettable experience.

Casa Havana Salon attracts devoted clientele from far and wide. They are a friendly and welcoming locally-oriented salon that focuses on beautifying the community! The salon incorporates innovative technology to make sure all of the services and products are top of the line. 

The Salon’s technicians specialize in a range of treatments that will maintain your appearance while also nurturing your body and pampering your soul. All Casa Havana Salon team members are highly trained in their areas of expertise, and continue to enhance their skills through seminars, advanced training and traditional certificates.

This is the perfect space to unwind to the sound of Spanish guitars while sipping Cuban coffee and getting the best treatment. 

For more information or to book an appointment call 04 3215757 or visit them online: www.casahavanasalon.com

name: Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo
description:
Discover an aquatic world that brings the marvels of underwater and tropical life into the heart of the city at Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo, one of the most captivating attractions at The Dubai Mall. 

Dive into a memorable adventure that illuminates the many wonders of the ocean floor and showcases some of the most diverse collections of aquatic life. Experience real-time atmospheric shifts as the aquariums ambience changes with a unique ‘lunar-cyclic’ lighting system set to the time of day to recreate a normal 24-hour cycle for the aquatic animals. As one of the largest indoor suspended aquariums in the world with a capacity to hold 10 million litres of water, Dubai Aquarium is home to thousands of aquatic animals.

Enjoy an excellent view of underwater life through the largest acrylic viewing panel in the world or go for close-encounters with a fascinating collection of sea creatures when walking through the 270* view acrylic tunnel.

Located just above the aquarium, Underwater Zoo leads visitors through three ecological zones – Rainforest, Rocky Shore and Living Ocean – to bring them up close with penguins, piranhas, crabs, water rats, sea horses, jellyfish and plenty more.

The Underwater Zoo is also home to one of nature‘s rare phenomenon and one of the world’s largest reptiles. King Croc and his female companion of 20 years reside here in a special enclosure that replicates their natural habitat. At over 5 metres long and weighing an imposing 750 kg plus, the 40 year old King Croc weighs the equivalent of over 15 fully-grown men!

name: Give a Ghaf
description:
Want to give a gift that is environmentally friendly? Goumbook’s ‘Give a Ghaf’ tree planting program allows you to dedicate a tree on behalf of your friends and family, which will help maintain the trees and improve new planting sites for wildlife.

The Ghaf tree is the UAE National Tree, also called the Union tree, this tree is one great survivor! Fierce temperatures, searing winds, high rates of water loss the Ghaf tolerates them all. Ghaf is a multipurpose tree of arid lands that is even considered a solution to desertification, it also stabilizes dunes while it improves soil.

You could also choose this unique and thoughtful gift to a friend or loved one on their Birthday, for your parents on Mother’s Day or Father’s Day, or to surprise your beloved on Valentine’s Day. It’s the perfect gift for families, friends, colleagues or loved ones on festivals like Eid, Diwali or Christmas!

Just name it and you can be sure that it is available at Home Box. So, if you know someone whose home needs an upgrade, then don’t think further than this online eGift voucher. 

All in all, the Home Box eGift card is the one that sends all the right messages. Every “Congratulations”, “thank you”, “happy anniversary”, “happy Mother’s day”, “happy birthday”, “happy house warming”, “Merry Christmas”, and “Happy New Year” should be accompanied with this unique and one-of-a-kind, eGift card!

description:
تجربة Go Sport واستخدام إحدى بطاقات الهدايا التي نوفرها لشراء المستلزمات الرياضية وأدوات الأنشطة الخارجية! امنح صديقك القدرة على الاختيار من بين أحدث الأدوات والمعدات الرياضية من العلامات التجارية التي تحظى بشهرة عالمية، فضلاً عن مجموعة متنوعة من المنتجات المستقلة والجديدة وغير التقليدية المتاحة في هذا المتجر. سواء أكنت موجودًا في دبي أم أبو ظبي، تتوفر منتجات تناسب الجميع! يعد Go Sport متجرًا متميزًا متخصصًا في بيع المعدات الرياضية الفاخرة من العلامات التجارية العالمية والمحلية منذ عام 2008. يضم المتجر أحدث الأحذية من جميع العلامات التجارية العالمية والمحلية، من بينها Adidas وNike وReebok وPuma. أيُّ هدية لشخصٍ مولع باللياقة البدنية أفضل من زوجٍ جديد من أحذية الركض من اختياره؟ وبالإضافة إلى هذه العلامات التجارية، يتوفر غيرها من العلامات التجارية العصرية مثل BodyTalk. وإلى جانب الأحذية، سيتمكن أحبابك من الوصول إلى أحدث معدات اللياقة البدنية والمستخدمة في الأنشطة الخارجية. يزخر متجر Go Sport بكل هذه المعدات، مثل أحدث الملابس الرياضية المناسبة لأنشطة الركض أو السباحة أو مجرد ممارسة التمرينات العادية. إذا كان أصدقاؤك من محبي الأنشطة الخارجية، فيمكنهم الاختيار من معدات التخييم والسير على الأقدام وركوب قوارب الكاياك! وإذا كانوا يحتاجون إلى إكسسوارات هذه المعدات، فستكون لديهم إمكانية الوصول إلى مجموعة كبيرة من الحقائب والجوارب وزجاجات المياه ومجموعة من المعدات الرياضية المختلفة. لذا، حافظ على لياقتك واستمتع بممارسة الأنشطة الخارجية باستخدام إحدى بطاقات هدايا Go Sport التي نوفرها!

 

Where can you fulfill all your sports needs? Try Go Sport with one of our sports and outdoor gift cards! Give a friend the ability to choose from the latest sports gear and equipment from internationally reputable brands, and funky new independent varieties available at this store. Whether you are in Dubai or Abu Dhabi, there’s something for everyone! Go Sport is a premium store which has been selling luxury sports gear from international and local brands since 2008. They have the newest in footwear ranging from all of your most loved brands including Adidas, Nike, Reebok, and Puma. What better gift to give a fitness fan than the choice of their own new pair of running shoes? In addition to these brands, trendy others are available such as BodyTalk. Besides footwear, your loved ones will have access to the latest in fitness and outdoor equipment gear. Go Sport has it all, such as the latest sports apparel for running, swimming, or just regular training. If the outdoors is what your friend loves, than they can choose from camping, hiking, and even kayaking gear! If it’s accessories they need, than they will have access to a wide range of bags, socks, water bottles and a range of different sports gear. So stay fit and enjoy the outdoors with one of our Go Sport gift cards!

name: KidZania
description:
Has your child ever expressed wishes of following an exciting career when they grow up - perhaps a pilot; a doctor, a chef or a even a firefighter!

KidZania® makes all those dreams come true by providing children and their parents a safe, unique and very realistic educational environment that allows kids between the ages of four to sixteen to do what comes naturally to them; role-playing activities done by adults in real life and showing them how its done!
By blending reality with entertainment, KidZania® helps kids acquire real-life skills; learn about working and having a career.

KidZania® offers over 80 role-playing activities with real life experiences where a child can work as a firefighter, banker, police officer, doctor, radio host and more.

Kids are welcomed into a little big world as the this indoor edutainment center is a city scaled to size for children, complete with buildings, paved streets, vehicles, a functioning economy, and recognizable destinations in the form of renowned establishments.

This iconic city features a smaller version of a university, fire station, race track, radio station, pizzeria, hospital, bank, and theatre amongst others. Children get a fantastic opportunity to dress up in realistic uniforms and feel empowered to live as grown-ups do. One of the most popular attractions is the mini airplane where children can be pilots mimicking the aviator role in actual cockpits or as stewardess who carryout preflight safety demonstrations.

The experience of watching children make decisions and thrive in a child-sized replica of a real city is invaluable. A perfect outing for the entire family where parents can relax and unwind with various activities and offerings at the Parents Lounge or shop at The Dubai Mall while children enjoy learning at KidZania®

FACES, Live your beauty.

name: Tao Spa
description:
Tao Spa strives to offer an authentic oriental spa experience. The Spa was founded on the philosophy of Taoism to create balance & harmony as a way of life, using traditional healing techniques in combination with quality products known for their healing and beauty properties. Tao Spa creates a fusion which ensures complete relaxation and rejuvenation while providing customized and attentive treatments focused on high service standards rivaling five-star Hotel Spas.

The Tao Spa family have put in tremendous effort and energy into building the Spa on this philosophy and more importantly staying true to the principles in every operational aspect of the Spa. The sleek modern design of the Spa merges with a natural ambience of an oriental oasis, providing a welcoming and comfortable setting, perfect for enjoying a variety of relaxing and invigorating treatments.

The aim for profit often overpowers quality in many Spas and this is how Tao Spa strives to be different and prides itself on providing superior quality in treatments and excellent customer service. We offer a unique selection of massage oils based on a variety of different essential oils, which guests can choose from upon arrival to the spa including a Detoxifying Oil which developed its healing properties from the herbs and spices that are cooked in virgin coconut oil for two days according to ancient recipes and traditions. The exclusive Organic Shea butter used at Tao is locally grown in the heart of Africa and packaged in Dubai which is also available in the Spa’s Boutique alongside other products used in the Spa. Beautifully packaged, and perfect to take home as a gift or souvenir.

For more information, please visit the wonderful team at Tao Spa or find us on all social media platforms to keep up to date with all the latest news, offers and updates.

What makes Us unique:

Tao Spa develops each therapist individually to ensure each therapist achieves & maintains high standards. It is believed at Tao Spa that well trained and content staff, transmit positive energy throughout the Spa, further enhancing the guest’s experience. In addition, our treatments are all based on ancient Asian rituals, which have been further developed in-¬house to ensure our guests are provided with an incredible, one of a kind modern Dubai experience.

name: Dubai Ice Rink
description:
Glide across the Olympic-sized Dubai Ice Rink where unlimited fun awaits skating enthusiast. Dubai Ice Rink us a must-visit leisure attraction and sports venue in The Dubai Mall, particularly popular among teens, offering several unmatched features for youth.

In addition to skating sessions and training programs, Dubai Ice Rink has further enhanced its lifestyle appeal with cool Disco nights and Family DJ sessions, among others, to add to the joy f the youngsters and young at heart. The rink also has a snowfall feature that makes the skating experience more magical. 
Dubai Ice Rink is a member of the International Skating Institute and offers individual membership to its students which allows for official testing, documentation and participation in competitions and shows.

Dubai Ice Rink employs the latest technology to create, and maintain the ice consistency and quality to the highest standards. 

Over 2,000 pairs of skates have been imported from a leading manufacturer in Italy to fit children and adults of all ages and sizes. Ice Marshals are at hand at all times during public skating hours to ensure customer safety, and the Zamboni - a special ice resurfacing machine - is deployed across the rink every couple of hours to ensure top quality ice at all times.

name: KidZania - Abu Dhabi
description:
Buildings, city blocks, plazas and streets for children to play at being adults, with 60 different real-life professions available for children with big dreams. This is what KidZania is all about: an interactive city made for children and run by them, a city that combines inspiration, fun and learning through realistic role-play.
 
This award-winning edutainment concept is now available in Abu Dhabi with the opening of Kidzania Abu Dhabi at Yas Mall. KidZania Abu Dhabi spans over 5,500 square meters where you can find children’s versions of a hospital, fire station, beauty salon, bank, oil company, radio and TV station, supermarket, pizzeria and more, all made even more realistic with local industry partners empowering kids and allowing them to find out what it’s like to work in all of them. From television anchors reading the news, to police officers performing detective work and chefs cooking up tasty food, role-playing activities will introduce them to different careers in a fun and interactive way.
 
At KidZania Abu Dhabi, children ages 1 to 16 have the opportunity of having adult-like experiences while assuming the role of firemen, construction workers, police officers, and fashion designers, among others. Not only that, kids are also made aware of the importance of earning Kidzos (KidZania’s currency), and managing their earnings, preparing them to be responsible future adults. In addition, visitors will find Food & Beverage, Merchandising and Media dedicated locations, creating a broad offering of urban environments, establishments and activities to enjoy the complete KidZania experience.

name: Qanz
description:
Are you on the lookout for an extraordinary gift for an extraordinary person? Well, you have come to the right place because the Qanz Gift Card is truly exceptional and its offering is truly unique. With 12 brands on offer, this card is the ultimate gift of choice, allowing your loved ones to choose the items they want and love for their special occasions.

It is also very well suited for a birthday since receivers can choose their dream items from their preferred stores. The Qanz Gift Card also works for Valentine’s Day, as a House Warming gift or even for an anniversary. There are many life occasions that must absolutely be accompanied with this amazing Gift Card! 

Most importantly, this gift is great if you are running out of gift ideas. That’s because you do not have to worry anymore about randomly purchasing gifts that receivers might exchange. Instead, you are making them truly happy by offering them the gift of freedom to choose what they want for their special occasion. 

With 12 international and popular brands to choose from, this is the perfect card for all occasions and for all people. Hesitate no further and choose the Qanz Gift Card today!

Cleopatra’s spa offers a high standard of service and opulent surroundings. The spa operates both a Male and Female Spa 7 Days a week to offer you your treatment when you need it most!

description:
At Jacques La Coupe, we believe that the best way to stay ahead in a saturated market is to continuously develop new skills, products, and services, and accept no compromises on quality. Therefore, since the salon’s inception, Jacques La Coupe’s head stylist and creative director diligently attends all major international industry events – Cosmoprof in Bologna, Salon International in London, Behind The Chair events in the US, and Haute Coiffure Française in Paris – as well as the “Big Four” fashion weeks (New York, London, Milan, and Paris) to stay current on all trends and innovations. Our head stylist is also part of an exclusive group of industry heavyweights who develop the Fall/Winter and Spring/Summer hair collections with L’Oréal under the name of Atelier de 14, headquartered at 14 Rue Royale, Paris. 

Additionally, all of our hair stylists are handpicked by the creative director for their individual skills and proficiencies, and undergo biannual training and professional development for hair trends, technique, and customer service, under the guidance and support of Jacques Hanna himself.

Anything from Guitars, Drums, Keyboards, Violins... You name it, we’ve got it! 

Imagine, giving your loved ones the opportunity to select from any musical instrument or audio equipment they would like!

If you know anyone with musical talent, then a Melody House eGift Card is the perfect present for them! With a wide variety of instruments and equipment to choose from that will simply make their heart sing!

name: Le Petit Belge
description:
Le Petit Belge stands for all small things that make Belgium great.

We are a Belgian safe haven where everyone can enjoy the good taste of Belgian culture in its broadest sense. We are more than a restaurant, more than a bar, we are the informal embassy of Belgian food and hop culture.

Le Petit Belge, Because we are the smallest country in Europe, that is how the French name us. We are David, not Goliath, we are great in being small.

L’ Ambassade informelle de la Belgique, Because we are more than a restaurant, more than a bar, we are the informal embassy of Belgian food and hop culture.

We create unique drinking experiences by pairing the right hops with the food offer. Everybody knows our Belgian hops. From the more known brands to real unique and never seen before.

Undiz is shaking up the French lingerie sector- becoming the BFF of girls (and boys) who feel good about themselves. The founding concept is: be innovative, be cheeky, be avant-garde!

Undiz invented the concept “cool_lingerie”, lingerie that comes with self-confidence. Lingerie is no longer something that needs to be hidden! it’s an outlet to express and assert your personality.

Build imaginative, awe-inspiring worlds with your friends. Compete in heart-pounding matches that require quick thinking and fast reflexes. STARZPLAY utilizes advanced technology to provide a premium viewing experience with full HD and 4K content sourced from some of the most important studios in the entertainment business, such as 20th Century Fox, CBS, Disney, Lionsgate, Paramount, Showtime, Sony, Starz, Universal and Warner Bros.

STARZPLAY also delivers amazing value – for a low monthly fee subscribers can enjoy unlimited ad-free access to a wide choice of entertainment. STARZPLAY allows you to watch anytime, anywhere on an iOS or Android device, and also supports Mac and Windows browsers, and streams via Apple TV, Chromecast, a PS4 console or directly to a Samsung or LG smart TV. Each of our photographers have their own unique style which Stu Williamson Photography carefully match to our clients. This has helped us to gain many high profile commissions throughout the UAE from clients such as Armani at the Burj Khalifa, the Jumeriah Group’s Burj Al Arab and His Royal Highness Sheik Hamdan Bin Mohammed Al Maktoum.

We specialise in contemporary and avant-garde family portraits, creating timeless images that are artistic and vibrant. With over twenty years at the forefront of the European photographic industry, we have been regularly achieving worldwide acclaim for our portraits.

We are widely considered as one of the region’s premier family portrait photographers.

name: Vincci
description:
Looking to gift your loved ones some stylish bags and footwear for a special occasion? Treat them with an eGift Card from Vincci  

Vincci, part of Malaysia based Padini Group is a fashion footwear & handbag brand established in 1981. A playground for shoe lovers and addicts, Vincci was among the first Malaysian brands to push the boundaries in footwear by introducing hot off the runway styles at incredibly affordable prices.

The brand approaches shoe making as an art form and design challenge. Drawing inspiration from the great maisons, fashion week events and up-to-the-minute fashion news, Vincci creates footwear that is distinctive, desirable and on trend. It is present in over 100 countries. 

The same approach is extended to their bags and accessories collections. By adhering to affordability, trendiness and a quick-to-market strategy, Vincci is today an iconic brand with a huge global following of adoring shoes enthusiasts.

description: The Meat Co is an elite brand of steakhouse. As one of Dubai’s staple restaurants, The Meat Co is established as a UAE leader in the premium steakhouse category. Its signature steaks are whet aged in-house to ensure they are unique in both taste and texture. Located near some of Dubai and Abu Dhabi's most iconic landmarks, The Meat Co restaurants boast views of the Burj Khalifa, the Dubai Fountains, the Burj Al Arab and the Grand Mosque in Abu Dhabi. Leveraging off its African heritage, The Meat Co’s innovative design and striking décor reflects an eclectic combination of colour, texture and bespoke elements to create a sense of theatre for diners. Whether you want to reward a colleague, treat a friend or spoil that special someone, a gift voucher for The Meat Co offers a truly unique and memorable dining experience.
